name: Reeducator
description:
It's a serious game about legs reeducation.

A patient has to do movements for his reeducation. With series of 10 movements, he reaches to a game where he controls a character. The purpose is to bring the character at the end of its level and when he completes the level, he cans upgrade the characters skills or his castle.

Our objective is to bring more playful and more rewarding reeducation!
